channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 尽管看好前景，Vanguard 仍考虑增加信贷风险对冲
item.description:
Vanguard considering more credit exposure hedges despite bullish outlook https://t.co/y9i3EJryKQ pic.twitter.com/k6nAnjWQr6

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: @Breakingviews：在中国，苹果和特斯拉等美国公司面临着需求减弱以及华为和比亚迪等国内竞争对手的青睐。@sharonlam_ 解释说，中国消费者不断变化的口味表明，这种困境可能会恶化。
item.description:
On @Breakingviews: In China, American companies like Apple and Tesla face weakening demand and a preference for domestic rivals like Huawei and BYD. Chinese consumers’ evolving tastes suggest that the woes could worsen, explains @sharonlam_ pic.twitter.com/CaIJLCcQ6f

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 诺和诺德公司的市场估值飙升至5660亿美元，超过了特斯拉和Visa，此前这家减肥药Wegovy的制造商宣布了一种新型肥胖症药物的积极早期试验数据：
item.description:
Novo Nordisk’s market valuation soared to $566 billion, beating both Tesla and Visa, after the maker of weight-loss drug Wegovy announced positive early trial data for a new obesity drug.
More here: https://t.co/W4obnUP9xN pic.twitter.com/ZuEgA997ja

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 欧洲证券与金融管理局（ESMA）主席表示：公司层面的信息披露是绿色转型融资的关键
item.description:
Company level disclosure key to financing green transition, says ESMA chair https://t.co/BbpvwhDNIs pic.twitter.com/dZFKwf2Jor

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 德国面临多方面的罢工，数百万人受到影响。火车司机和机场工人纷纷罢工，在经济衰退迫在眉睫之际加剧了该国的经济困境：
item.description:
Germany faced strikes on several fronts, affecting millions of people. Train drivers and airport workers walked off the job, adding to the country's economic woes at a time of looming recession.
Read more: https://t.co/E7MtfeWWTW pic.twitter.com/Fe9wpz3qXC

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 布兰森的维珍货币（Virgin Money）品牌将消失，因为全国金融公司（Nationwide）将加入进来
item.description:
Branson's Virgin Money brand set to disappear as Nationwide swoops https://t.co/wiOkO2AncZ pic.twitter.com/iZwVnZO9Yo

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行将借贷成本维持在历史高位，并强调尽管通胀放缓的速度比几个月前预期的要快，但仍未准备好降低利率：
item.description:
The European Central Bank kept borrowing costs at record highs and stressed that while inflation was easing faster than it anticipated only a few months ago, it was still not ready to lower rates.
More here: https://t.co/nEgSPXdW2k pic.twitter.com/q3EMH2MVcB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 德国时尚巨头雨果博斯（Hugo Boss）警告今年销售增长将大幅放缓后，投资者纷纷逃离该公司股票，周四雨果博斯股价暴跌，创下八年来最差股价。
item.description:
Hugo Boss shares plummeted on Thursday in its worst session in eight years as investors ran from the stock after the German fashion giant warned of much slower sales growth this year https://t.co/X6fVMaSyW0 pic.twitter.com/j76U4kutrC

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 观看：汉莎航空（Lufthansa）受到了一系列罢工的打击。该航空公司警告称，第一季度的经营亏损将扩大，并对今年的前景作出了低估，因为其代价高昂的劳资纠纷抵消了旅游热潮的影响。
item.description:
WATCH: Lufthansa has been battered by a series of strikes. The carrier warned operating losses in the first quarter will widen and gave a subdued outlook for this year as its costly labor disputes offset a travel boom https://t.co/2FUVOFTXLk pic.twitter.com/CXP2CbzyAp

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024
